items.title: Here’s all you need to know about times and promos for LEGO’s upcoming Black Friday/Cyber Monday 2025 event
items.summary:
With the clock slowly ticking us closer and closer to LEGO’s official Black Friday/Cyber Monday savings, which comes a week after the pre-Black Friday Insiders Weekend 2025 event, many builders are still buzzing in prolonged anticipation as some ongoing promotions are joined by this year’s lead “ship” set, a new wave of special savings, complete with new GWP sets, discounts and increased Insider points on select building sets, and more. All the details you’re looking to know have been collected for you below so you can better prepare ahead of the official kick-off.

items.title: Regularly $170 ASUS ROG Falchion RX low profile keyboard is down to $100 all-time low for Black Friday
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing Black Friday Week sale event, Amazon is offering ASUS’ ROG Falchion RX low-profile wireless gaming keyboard for $99.99 shipped. This is originally a $170 unit that has fetched as much as $173 in recent months at Amazon. Today’s 42% discount shaves $73 off its usual going rate, landing it $14 below its previous all-time low. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this variant with low-profile red switches, and you’ll find the one with red switches at $119.99 shipped. Head below for more details.

items.title: The USPTO issues new guidelines clarifying that generative AI is considered a tool that assists human inventors and cannot itself be considered an inventor (Blake Brittain/Reuters)
items.summary:
Blake Brittain / Reuters:
The USPTO issues new guidelines clarifying that generative AI is considered a tool that assists human inventors and cannot itself be considered an inventor  —  The U.S. Patent and Trademark Office issued new guidelines on Wednesday outlining when inventions created with the help of artificial intelligence can be patented.

This more advanced surveillance device fetches $140 in full, with discounts having only gone as low as $80 previously. Those deals are all getting beaten out by this 50% markdown, saving you $70 and upgrading your indoor home security at a new all-time low price. You can also check out Anker’s other eufy Black Friday security cams, video doorbells, and more at new lows starting from $50.

items.summary:
Update 11/27: The standard Sonos Arc Smart Soundbar with Dolby Atmos in white is $399 shipped, down from $599 today at Best Buy. The rest of Black Friday offers at Amazon are still live below.

As part of its now live Black Friday Week sale event, Amazon is offering some solid price drops across the Sonos home theater ecosystem. You can now cash in on these deals to secure up to $220 in savings, and the prices start at $169. These are some of the best deals we’ve seen on Sonos gear all year, and many of these are now seeing fresh lows since the official price hike hit not too long ago – making it a great time to upgrade your home audio setup. From the popular Arc Ultra soundbar to portable Bluetooth speakers, subwoofers, and more, the full list of offers is ready and waiting for you down below.

items.title: Originally $100 3-in-1 charging cube for your entire Apple kit is down to just $29 for Black Friday
items.summary:
LISEN 3-in-1 wireless charging cube

Buy for $29 (Reg. up to $60)

Enter promo code EC3GEGKY for $8.25 off.

What we love

This compact, foldable charging station can handle your entire Apple setup at once and collapses into a tidy little cube when you’re done. It includes three dedicated wireless spots for your iPhone, AirPods, and Apple Watch, with up to 7.5W for the iPhone and 2.5W each for the other two. It’s not the fastest charger, but the space-saving design and budget-friendly price make it worth considering, especially as a bedside solution for overnight charging.

items.summary:
As part of Amazon’s Black Friday Week Sale, we just spotted an extremely rare discount on the NVIDIA Shield Pro Android TV Streaming Media Player for $169.99 shipped. This popular device has spent the overwhelming majority of 2025 keeping to its $200 full price, with the discounts larger than a few dollars having only occurred once, way back in February, when it fell to $180.
